Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: af[icarx qen ]paryenoc. All/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, was incarnate of the Virgin. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا، يسوع المسيح ابن الله تجسد من العذراء الليلويا الليلويا .
